sentences.en: "I think I could find you something."—"That would be super."
sentences.cn: “我想我可以给你找到点儿什么东西。”——“那太棒了。”

sentences.en: A reviewer called her first novel'super - romantic'and the label has stuck.
sentences.cn: 有个评论家把她的处女作称为 ‘ 超级浪漫小说 ’,这个美称就叫开了.

sentences.en: an old car in super condition
For super-soft skin, lather on a light body lotion before you bathe.
sentences.cn: 皮肤极柔嫩者，可在沐浴前涂上温和的护肤露。

sentences.en: He is currently starring in pantomime in Weston-super-Mare.
sentences.cn: 他目前正在滨海韦斯顿主演圣诞童话剧。

sentences.en: His super-clean image gave a veneer of respectability to the new professional set-up.
sentences.cn: 他超级整洁的形象使其新设的专业骗局看起来很正规很体面。

sentences.en: Instead of Super Saturday, we will call it Insanity's Super Saturday.
sentences.cn: 我们可以把《超级星期六》改叫成《疯狂超级星期六》.

sentences.en: She got a super new dress.
sentences.cn: 她有一套很漂亮的新衣服.

sentences.en: The best reason for a trip to London is the super opportunity for shopping.
sentences.cn: 绝佳的购物机会是前往伦敦的最好理由。

sentences.en: Their bodies were well-developed and super fit.
sentences.cn: 他们的身体发育得很好，非常健壮。

sentences.en: We had a super time in Italy.
sentences.cn: 我们在意大利过得十分惬意。

sentences.en: Winners of each regional will advance to the super regionals.
sentences.cn: 每个地区分支机构的获胜者们将会晋级为超级地区性人物。

sentences.en: You look super in your new clothes!
sentences.cn: 你穿着这套新衣服漂亮极了!
你一定喜欢她, 她好极了.

words.tran_cn: 特级品，特大号；临时雇员

phrases.tran_cn: 美国橄榄球超级杯大赛
超级少年（韩国超人气组合）
超级星期二；总统竞选初选日（通常在3月份的）
